function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid education of healthcare workforce leading to potential gaps in knowledge and skills","Impact":"Ineffective management of respiratory conditions, compromised patient care","Mitigation":"Regular assessments and upskilling opportunities, virtual learning platforms","Technologies":"Virtual learning platforms, e-learning packages","People":"Healthcare workforce, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, education providers"},{"Description":"Use of digital health solutions for rapid redeployment education","Impact":"Inefficient redeployment leading to compromised patient care","Mitigation":"Bespoke redeployment training, virtual assessments","Technologies":"Digital health solutions, virtual training platforms","People":"Healthcare workforce, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, education providers"},{"Description":"Rapid development and implementation of new models of care supported by digital health innovation","Impact":"Potential risks of inadequate patient management, lack of in-person care","Mitigation":"Telemedicine consultation approaches, virtual care protocols","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital health innovation","People":"Vulnerable patients, healthcare staff","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, digital health providers"}]}
